coherent.sentence: This is a () sentence -- 这是一个连贯的句子

elitisim.sentence: We must avoid cultural () -- 我们必须避免文化精英主义

indispensable.sentence: Health is () to everyone -- 健康是人人所不可缺少的

sophistic.sentence: There is some truth in criticism, but it s a () attack that lacks context -- 评论里确有一丝真理，不过这种攻击只是断章取义的诡辩
